data.comment: The big names in today's match at Abe Lenstra Stadion have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
In the minute 13, Eindhoven's Pablo Rosario has been booked in Heerenveen.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Mario Gotze.
That's a fine assist from Cody Gakpo.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Heerenveen.
Eindhoven make their first substitution with Jorrit Hendrix replacing Mohammed Ihattaren.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Sieben Dewaele with Rami Hajal.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's second substitution at Abe Lenstra Stadion with Adrian Fein replacing Philipp Max.
Chukwunonso Madueke is on a sub for Cody Gakpo for Eindhoven.
In the minute 69, Goal! Henk Veerman levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Joey Veerman to set up the goal.
Ulysses Llanez Jr. Is replacing Benjamin Nygren for the home team.
In the minute 77, Eindhoven make their fourth substitution with Joel Piroe replacing Donyell Malen.
Richard Ledezma is replacing Mario Gotze for Eindhoven at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
Goal! Mitchell Van Bergen gives Heerenveen a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 78, Rodney Kongolo with an assist there.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Joel Piroe grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
At Abe Lenstra Stadion, Denzel Dumfries has been yellow-carded for the away team.
